predictor

Class TransformSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • predictor.TransformSequence

  • class TransformSequence
extends java.lang.Object
    TransformSequence

    Transform a given sequence into feature vectors and writes it into a new ARFF file for classification prediction

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Christine Eng
